snippet: Ultimate Fighting Championship fighters will wear standardized uniforms next year.
abstract: Ultimate Fighting Championship president Dana White announces that fighters will wear standardized uniforms in 2015.
lead_paragraph: Ultimate Fighting Championship fighters will wear standardized uniforms next year.

headline.main: U.F.C. Will Issue Uniforms for ‘More Professional’ Look
headline.print_headline: U.F.C. Will Issue Uniforms for ‘More Professional’ Look
